name: Total War: Rome II - Caesar in Gaul
name_original: Total War: Rome II - Caesar in Gaul
description:
Total War: Rome II - Caesar in Gaul is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It came out on 17-12-2013. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Total War: Rome II - Caesar in Gaul on PC.
